#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<iomanip>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<set>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef unsigned long long ull;
typedef double db;

int main()
{
  //ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
  //cin.tie(NULL);
  map<string,string> mp;
  ll t,n;
  string id;
  char v;
  cin>>t;
  map <string,string> :: iterator it;
while(t--)
{   ll vote=0;
  cin>>n;
  for(int i=0;i<n;i++ )
  {
  	cin>>id>>v;
  	mp[id]=v;
  }
  
  for(it=mp.begin();it!=mp.end();it++)
  {
  	if(it->second=="+")
  	 vote++;
  	else
	  if(it->second=="-")
	  vote--; 
  }
  cout<<vote<<"\n";
  mp.clear();
}

   	return 0;
}
